Package WebServer

Class myPluginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • WebServer.myPluginManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BIF.SWE1.interfaces.PluginManager
    public class myPluginManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements BIF.SWE1.interfaces.PluginManager

    Plugin Manager Class

    Class to load plugins, add new ones and select which plugin is needed for a request

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      myPluginManager()
      Constructor - load plugins at runtime

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(BIF.SWE1.interfaces.Plugin plugin)
      Check if a certain plugin exists then adds it to the plugin list if it is not already in the list
      void add​(java.lang.String plugin)
      Check for correct name form first Create a new instance of the name and check if a class with the same name exists If the class exists, add a instance of the plugin to the plugin list (Throw errors for various exceptions)
      void clear()
      clear plugin list for reloading purposes
      java.lang.Iterable<BIF.SWE1.interfaces.Plugin> getPlugins()
      Second part of the iterator
      java.util.Iterator<BIF.SWE1.interfaces.Plugin> iterator()
      The iterator for the plugin list
      void loadPlugins()
      check the text file with the list of plugins that can be loaded and add them
      BIF.SWE1.interfaces.Plugin selectPlugin​(BIF.SWE1.interfaces.Request req)
      Get all canHandle float nums from the plugins in order to decide which plugin will handle the request

      • loadPlugins

        public void loadPlugins()
        check the text file with the list of plugins that can be loaded and add them
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on scanner/file error
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - on insufficient access rights
        java.lang.InstantiationException - on error at class instancing
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - on missing plugin class
